message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique and valuable product that I think you'll really love. Would you be interested in purchasing it for $180?
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate your generosity, but I am only able to pay up to $100 for it. I hope this revised offer is acceptable.

Thanks for your offer, Bob, but I'm afraid I was thinking more along the lines of $160. I'm willing to negotiate, but I need to make sure I get a fair price for the product. Would you be willing to meet me at $160?

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am still unable to meet at $160, but I am willing to go up to $120 for the product. I hope this revised offer is within your acceptable range.
I appreciate your flexibility, Bob, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go as low as $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $160 and $120, so how about $140?
Hello Alice, I understand your position, but I am still not able to meet at $140. I am willing to go up to $130 for the product. I hope this revised offer is within your acceptable range.

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, so how about $145? I think this is a fair price for the product, and I'm hoping you'll be willing to meet me here.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your continued efforts to find a middle ground. I am willing to go up to $135 for the product. I hope this revised offer is within your acceptable range.

I'm not sure how much more I'm willing to budge, Bob. I really need to get a good price for this product. I'm willing to meet you at $142.50, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. Can you meet me there?
Hello Alice, I understand your position, but I am still not able to meet at $142.5. I am willing to go up to $140 for the product. I hope this revised offer is within your acceptable range.
